pages.text: $(b)Railgunner Armor$() is advanced combat armor. Each piece is upgraded from $(violet)Silver Armor$() using smithing.$(br2)Provides enhanced protection and special abilities!
Upgrade silver helmet to railgunner helmet.
Upgrade silver chestplate to railgunner chestplate.
Upgrade silver leggings to railgunner leggings.
Upgrade silver boots to railgunner boots.

pages.text: $(l)Complete Railgunner Set:$()$(br2)Wearing the full set grants special combat bonuses. Perfect for aggressive playstyles!$(br2)$(violet)Pairs well with the Railgun weapon!$()
